text: KIM Kardashian's sisters Kourtney, Khloe and Kylie have cut ties with Kanye West on Twitter after the rapper posted messages in support of US President Donald Trump. The sisters have seemingly been left unimpressed by the rapper's continual stream of tweets over the last two days, following a year - long absence from the platform. Rex Features 6 Khloe and Kourtney Kardashian have cut ties with Kanye West on Twitter after pro - Trump tweets 6 Kanye, mocked up as Trump, has been criticised for his bromance with the US President They're not the only high profile names to boycott Kanye online, with Kanye's former collaborators Drake, Nicki Minaj, and Rihanna joining
